Trade/Device Name(s): Medisign GH81 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign GH82 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign GH83 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign GH81 BT Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign GH82 BT Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Medisign GH83 BT Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Submitter Information: Tianjin Empecs Medical Device Co., Ltd.
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Medisign GH81 BT Blood Glucose Meter
Medisign GH82 BT Blood Glucose Meter
Medisign GH83 BT Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Medisign GH81, GH82, GH83, and GH81 BT, GH82 BT, GH83 BT Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using amperometric FAD-GDH method
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm for self-testing by people with diabetes at home to monitor diabetes control; single patient use only; not for diagnosis/screening of diabetes or neonatal use; alternative site testing for steady-state glucose levels
